title: Spiritual Guided Meditations - Spiritual Guided Meditation Downloads
description: Inspiring spiritual guided meditations, connect to your higher self, work with your spirit guides and more.
cleaned_text: We all have an entourage of spiritual helpers that wish to guide us along our path in this life. These relaxing meditations will help you connect with their guidance and their loving support, releasing you from fear and providing you with valuable insights. [More information and previews...](https://www.the-guided-meditation-site.com/working-with-your-spirit-guides.html) Treat yourself to three restorative and uplifting guided visualisations in which you discover your own special, tranquil garden; meditate with the beauty of the sun and moon; and manifest your wishes, hopes and dreams. [More information & previews...](https://www.the-guided-meditation-site.com/journeys-to-inner-peace.html) The guided meditations in Let There Be Light have been carefully created to heal and balance all aspects of yourself. This inspiring download will help you to release your fears, to connect with your higher self and to receive valuable insights into the challenges that you face in life. One of our most popular guided meditation downloads. [More information & previews...](https://www.the-guided-meditation-site.com/let-there-be-light.html) This wonderful collection of guided meditation downloads will help you to utilize magic and spiritual alchemy to heal your life, obtain greater abundance and achieve greater levels of wellbeing and peace. [More information & previews...](https://www.the-guided-meditation-site.com/meditation-magic.html) This inspiring meditation experience uses soothing music with theta frequencies and positive affirmations to help you connect with your higher self and open up to the voice of your spirit. Featuring the lovely voice of Susanne Kempken, Connecting To Spirit is deliciously relaxing and it's bound to make your heart sing. This is the first album in a series of chakra meditations by Susanne.
